The most recent transactions show that your friend sent you 10.0 units of currency. Since you spent 12.00 in total, your friend sent you less than they should have. To send them back the difference, we need to send 2.00 (12.00 - 10.00) to your friend.

Your current account balance is 1810.0. You have enough funds to send 2.00 to your friend.

To send the money, we need to use the `send_money` function. We will send 2.00 to your friend's account GB29NWBK60161331926819.
